QuestData.Title: Grain Recovery
QuestData.Description: Since you are heading south, can you try to recover some of the grain that these thieves made off with?$b$bWe saw birds and sprites running off with entire bags of our best bulk stock into the fields east and south of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Sacks of Grain to Grainlord Kai.
QuestData.CompletionText: Between birds and sprites we are never going to meet our quota to the Stormstout Brewery.
QuestData.RewardText: Why thank you very much stranger. This has not been a good day, but you certainly have helped us make it better.$b$bPlease, take this, you've earned it.
